string.name: box_sharesdk_num_collaborators_error

resources.string: %s could not be invited to this %s

string.description: Error message to display when users cannot be invited to current item, for truncation purposes emails must be at the end
string.name: box_sharesdk_following_collaborators_error

resources.string: The following collaborators could not be invited: %s

string.description: Error message to display when a user launches box to a file that no longer exists for their account
string.name: box_sharesdk_item_unavailable

resources.string: The item you are trying to access has either been deleted or is unavailable to you

string.description: Error shown if user does not have sufficient permissions for an action
string.name: box_sharesdk_insufficient_permissions

resources.string: You do not have sufficient permissions for this action.

string.desription: Error shown if user tries to change a pending invite to an owner of the folder
string.name: box_sharedsdk_new_owner_not_collaborator

resources.string: User is not yet a collaborator on this folder, and cannot be set as an owner.

string.description: Error shown if changing ownership fails for unknown reason
string.name: box_sharedsdk_unable_to_update_owner

resources.string: Unable to update owner. Please contact support.

string.description: Error shown when api fetching collaborators fails due to unknown reasons
string.name: box_sharesdk_cannot_get_collaborators

resources.string: Unable to fetch collaborators. Please contact support if the issue persists.
Unable to invite collaborators. Please contact support if the issue persists.

string.name: box_sharesdk_title_remove_different_collaboration_folder

string.name: box_sharesdk_warn_remove_different_collaboration_folder

resources.string: Type a name or email address
Invite collaborators is unavailable for collaborators with %s permissions. To invite collaborators, contact the owner of this %s.
Shared links are unavailable for collaborators with %s permissions. To share, contact the owner of this %s.

string.description: shown when there are no collaborators for the share item
